synopsis.text:
Sakimori Academy's brave student pilot, Haruto Tokishima, remains steadfast in his mission to protect the newly-declared nation of New JIOR from the overwhelming forces of the Dorushia Military Pact Federation. As the galaxy's superpowers grapple for control in an escalating interstellar war, the bonds and allegiances of every soldier are pushed to their limits. The enigmatic past of the Magus, L-elf, and the destiny of Liselotte W. Dorssia come to light, further entangling the web of intrigue.

While the battle against Dorssia rages on, unanswered questions surround the mysterious Valvrave mecha and its pilots. Both Dorssia and ARUS are determined to seize the Valvrave's extraordinary power, forcing the students of Module 77 to seek refuge on the neutral territory of the moon. As New JIOR's leader, Haruto must confront his aversion to conflict and stand alongside his fellow Valvrave pilots to safeguard their people and uncover the hidden truths behind the Valvraves and the Magius. The future of the galaxy hangs in the balance as the clash of ideologies and loyalties reaches its thrilling climax.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
